data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kameneva, Elena P., Korneyev, Valery A. (2012): A new species of Herina Robineau-Desvoidy, 1830 (Diptera: Ulidiidae) from Turkey, with the key to species of oscillans group. Zootaxa 3548: 69-74, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.282825
